meanings.definition: A woman who manages or directs a business or organization.
meanings.sent1: The manageresses of the company held a meeting to discuss the new project.
meanings.sent2: She is a skilled manageresses who knows how to lead her team effectively.
meanings.sent3: The manageresses decided to have a team-building day at the park.
meanings.sent4: Her presence in the office was like that of a captain guiding a ship, a true manageresses.
meanings.sent5: The manageresses' determination shone through as she tackled each challenge with grace.

meanings.definition: The female form of the word 'manager'.
meanings.sent1: In the play, the character was written as a manageresses to showcase gender equality.
meanings.sent2: The manageresses was proud to represent women in leadership roles.
meanings.sent3: The manageresses in the story had a unique way of solving problems.
meanings.sent4: She embodied the spirit of a manageresses, breaking stereotypes along the way.
meanings.sent5: The manageresses' confidence inspired others to pursue their dreams.
